#summary *DAAP client* is an application for android enabled devices.

= Introduction =

[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Digital_Audio_Access_Protocol DAAP] is a protocol that was originally introduced by iTunes, but has been reversed engineered.  Since, iTunes has changed the protocl; however, many other music servers still support the original protocl.  DAAP client is an application that allows you to connect to DAAP servers and listen to the music.

= Details =

We are on version 0.7 right now.  The most recent version adds support for streaming (albeit in beta), large screen support, and fixes other bugs - noticeably it now remembers the list position when hitting back.
